__e: Like, the people across the street say slavery wasn't as bad as we think it was.
And between us, the whole slavery thing I don't understand what the big deal was anyway.
"But this slavery is afforded not just for the rich, "but for every man according to his color.
But I tell you, it was not a question of slavery and never was!
